name: Extraplanar Pursuit
description: Heavy raidwide physical damage that marks the beginning of the fight.

name: Windfang
description: Hits all four players of one role with a conal AoE that deals split damage. Must be shared with one other player and inflicts vulnerability.

name: Eminent Reign
description: Spawns clones that charge in a direction, doing an AoE at the edge of the arena as well as in the centre. Followed by conal AoEs on both healers and tanks.

name: Extraplanar Pursuit
description: Heavy raidwide physical damage.

name: Millenial Decay
description: Heavy raidwide magic damage. Summons four wind wolf heads in succession that do line AoEs across the arena.

name: Aero III
description: Knockback from the centre of the arena, dealing light magic damage. Knockback immunity abilities can be used.

name: Wind of Decay
description: Wolf heads appear that tether to four players of one role at cardinals or intercardinals. These do a conal AoE towards them that deals proximity damage.

name: Prowling Gale
description: Towers that must be soaked by players, with the pillars in the tower determining how many players need to stand in them.

name: Tracking Tremors
description: A multi-hit stack marker on a healer. Hits eight times for heavy magic damage.

name: Extraplanar Pursuit
description: Heavy raidwide physical damage.

name: Great Divide
description: Shared tank buster on 1st in aggro. Can be invulned.

name: Terrestrial Titans
description: Summons two pillars that are slashed via Titanic Pursuit, causing them to fall. Creates two safe spots at opposite intercardinals.

name: Revolutionary Reign
description: Spawns clones that charge in a direction, doing an AoE at the edge of the arena as well as in the centre. Then does a large point-blank AoE which knocks back.

name: Howling Havoc
description: Heavy raidwide magic damage. A large persistent death AoE spawns in the middle of the arena.

name: Pack Predation
description: Each add does a conal tank buster on #1 on their respective aggro, as well as a conal AoE prey marker on one of the three other closest players.

name: Ravenous Saber
description: Five fast hits of a heavy physical raidwide after both adds die.

name: Heavensearth
description: Stack marker on one player of a role.

name: Suspended Stone
description: Marked AoE on four players in one role.

name: Shadowchase
description: Line AoEs from Howling Blade clones.

name: Roaring Wind
description: Line AoEs from wind wolf heads.

name: Eminent Reign
description: Spawns clones that charge in a direction, doing an AoE at the edge of the arena as well as in the centre.

name: Weal of Stone
description: Line AoEs from stone wolf heads.

name: Great Divide
description: Shared tank buster on 1st in aggro. Can be invulned.

name: Beckon Moonlight
description: Summons clones at cardinals, which cleave one half of the room the sword is facing with Moonbeam's Bite.

name: Tracking Tremors
description: A multi-hit stack marker on a healer. Hits eight times for heavy magic damage.

name: Extraplanar Pursuit
description: Heavy raidwide physical damage.

name: Quake III
description: Stack marker on both healers. Inflicts vulnerability and hits the entire platform the stack is on.

name: Ultraviolent Ray
description: Four players of one role and one player of the other role are marked. This shoots a line AoE that inflicts vulnerability and hits the entire platform.

name: Gleaming Beam
description: Two bits spawn on the back of each platform. One will charge up and fire, dealing damage to one half of the platform.

name: Twinbite
description: Magic tank buster on #1 and #2 on aggro. Hits the entire platform.

name: Hero's Blow
description: Howling Blade looks at one platform and prepares to swing his sword on the side it's glowing. This cleaves his left or right.

name: Gleaming Barrage
description: Donut or point-blank AoE from boss. Bits will be rotating around the boss, and the glow indicates if it hits in or out.

name: Ultraviolent Ray
description: Four players of one role and one player of the other role are marked. This shoots a line AoE that inflicts vulnerability and hits the entire platform.

name: Gleaming Beam
description: Two bits spawn on the back of each platform. One will charge up and fire, dealing damage to one half of the platform.

name: Quake III
description: Stack marker on both healers. Inflicts vulnerability and hits the entire platform the stack is on.

name: Elemental Purge
description: A 210 degree cleave on #1 in aggro after binding them, inflicting a vuln. Either #1 or #2 in aggro receive the Patience of Wind debuff, which is an AoE magical tank buster.

name: Twofold Tempest
description: Begins the first tether AoE. In addition, the closest player receives a shared line AoE that inflicts a short magic vuln.

name: Champion's Circuit
description: Each platform is hit by Gleaming Beam, as well as a wide line, donut, in-safe, or out-safe AoE. These AoEs will rotate in the direction indicated by the boss.

name: Quake III
description: Stack marker on both healers. Inflicts vulnerability and hits the entire platform the stack is on.

name: Ultraviolent Ray
description: Four players of one role and one player of the other role are marked. This shoots a line AoE that inflicts vulnerability and hits the entire platform.

name: Twinbite
description: Magic tank buster on #1 and #2 on aggro. Hits the entire platform.

name: Prowling Gale
description: Towers that must be soaked by players, with the pillars in the tower determining how many players need to stand in them.

name: Hero's Blow
description: Howling Blade looks at one platform and prepares to swing his sword on the side it's glowing. This cleaves his left or right.

name: Gleaming Barrage
description: Donut or point-blank AoE from boss. Bits will be rotating around the boss, and the glow indicates if it hits in or out.

name: Ultraviolent Ray
description: Four players of one role and one player of the other role are marked. This shoots a line AoE that inflicts vulnerability and hits the entire platform.

name: Howling Eight
description: A multi-hit tower on a platform that hits eight times. Deals shared magic damage. This is followed by Mooncleaver.

name: Starcleaver (Enrage)
description: Enrage wipe mechanic that destroys the final platform.
